turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, do they have veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can I get veggie lovers with extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine and I want gluten free crust, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd just like to pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.
